name: patch-_marketing_v3_marketing-events_events__externalEventId__update
description: Updates an existing Marketing Event with the specified id, if one exists.

externalEventId.description: The id of the marketing event to update

externalAccountId.description: The account id associated with the marketing event

body.description: The details of the marketing event to update

$ul: **customProperties**: A list of PropertyValues. These can be whatever kind of property names and values you want. However, they must already exist on the HubSpot account's definition of the MarketingEvent Object. If they don't they will be filtered out and not set.
**endDateTime**: The end date and time of the marketing event.
**eventCancelled**: Indicates if the marketing event has been cancelled.
**eventDescription**: The description of the marketing event.
**eventName**: The name of the marketing event.
**eventOrganizer**: The name of the organizer of the marketing event.
**eventType**: The type of the marketing event.
**eventUrl**: A URL in the external event application where the marketing event can be managed.
**startDateTime**: The start date and time of the marketing event.
**correlationId**: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets
**links**: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps
**message**: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate
**subCategory**: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error
